p: All 3 MtzR lines were generated at similar times at the Queensland Institute of Medical Research via long-term exposure to sublethal Mtz [ 30, 31], with intermittent drug treatment and ultraviolet radiation (WB and 713) also used to further induce resistance [ 31]. WB-M3, BRIS/83/HEPU/106-2ID10, and BRIS/83/HEPU/713-M3 were further explored in subsequent studies [ 2, 10–12, 14, 16, 32, 33]. The resistant lines used in the current study were selected in the presence of 30 μM Mtz [ 19] and exhibited significantly higher Mtz IC 50 values than their respective parent lines, indicating increased drug tolerance (Table 1).
